channel.title: ~ The Kingdom ~
channel.description:
[size=30pt]~ The Kingdom ~[/SIZE]
[B][I][U]Programmers[/U][/I][/B][size=10pt][/size]
- [B]Jonny J[/B] - Main Server Coder (Creator Of JSRevolution) - [B]Deadhead[/B] (Aka Wildy) - Server / Forums Coder. (Java, MySQL, And Php Expert) - [B]Light[/B] - Forums / Website Programmer - [B]Mr.Fox[/B] - Forums Helper
This Server Was Born From The Popular Community Of Wildyscape, And Is Now Taking Shape As A Legendary Server Soon To Be Released, With Full IPB Intergration, The Server Has Fully Functional Highscores, Stat Signitures, And Account Management.
[B][U][size=20pt]RELEASE DATE : NOT SET[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[B][I][U]In-Game Features[/U][/I][/B]
- 8 Custom Quests, Along With Requirements And Rewards Using A Custom Quest Base
- Prayer Icons, And Pk Skulls, Full Working.
- Peity And Chiverly Added To Old Prayers With Effects
- A 68 Wave Fight Caves, Along With Healer NPCs For Jad, And Jad With Switching Style
- Fight Pits, With Champion Fight Pit Table, Rewards.
- New Items, Visage, Godswords, Rune Crossbows, Dark Bows, Etc.
- Varrock [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Falador [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Lumbridge [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Al - Karid [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Fantasy Isle [COLOR=DimGray]40%[/COLOR] - Fantasy Dungeon [COLOR=YellowGreen]60%[/COLOR] - Wilderness [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Camelot [COLOR=YellowGreen]70%[/COLOR] - Rellaka [COLOR=YellowGreen]90%[/COLOR] - Lunar Isle [COLOR=YellowGreen]60%[/COLOR] - Edgeville / Edgeville Dungeon / Barbarian Village [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Canifis [COLOR=YellowGreen]80%[/COLOR] - Tzhaar [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Kalphite Lair [COLOR=DimGray]20%[/COLOR]
- Lunar Magiks
- Full Custom Base64 Encoding/Decoding System
- Ancient Magiks
- Stable Economy
[B][I][U]Skills[/U][/I][/B]
- Combat Stats (Attack, Defence, Strength, Hitpoints, Prayer, Magic, Range)[COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Runecrafting [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Agility, 3 Courses [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Herblore [COLOR=YellowGreen]65%[/COLOR] - Thieving [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Crafting [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Fletching [COLOR=YellowGreen]40%[/COLOR] - Slayer, With Slayer Master And Tasks Depending On Combat [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Mining / Smithing [COLOR=Green]95%[/COLOR] - Fishing / Cooking [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Woodcutting [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - [B][I][U]Forum Features[/U][/I][/B]
- Highscores [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Stat Signitures [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - Forum * Server Intergration [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR] - "Players Online: X " On Forums - Custom IBP Layout [COLOR=Green]Complete[/COLOR] - Customized Skin [COLOR=Green]Complete[/COLOR] - Transparent Drop Down Selection Tabs [COLOR=Green]Complete[/COLOR] - Download Center, Including Image Uploader, Video Gallery, Video Uploader. [COLOR=Green]Complete[/COLOR] - Get News And Updates Posted Sent To You Ipod Or IPhone [COLOR=Green]Complete[/COLOR] - Must Register On Forums To Play. [COLOR=Green]100%[/COLOR]
[B][I][U]Soon To Be Features[/U][/I][/B]
- Multiple Playing Worlds - Member Features (Premium Membership / Premium Worlds) - Godwars - Fully Functional Duel Arena With Staking
[B][I][U]Goals[/U][/I][/B]
- 300 Players Online At A Single Time - 10,000 Char Files Made - Recogonized Server / Community Throughout Private Servers - Impressive Economy - 100 Premium Members
[B][I][U]Special Thanks To...[/U][/I][/B]
- Deadhead - Light - Mr.Fox - Dylan - Yodoxin - ONERing - Fox.Recon (Ben) - You For Reading - The Previous Players Of Wildyscape, JSRevolution And The Kingdom - All Donaters And Supporters.
Forums Located At: [url=http://www.wildyscape.biz]http://www.wildyscape.biz[/url]
Any Flame Will Prove Your Immaturity To Me And The Community.
[B][U][size=20pt]BEFORE YOU SAY " THIS IS WRONG SECTION " This Is The DEVELOPMENT and help Section, The Description Is, SHOW US WHAT YOU HAVE DONE or ask for help[/SIZE][/U][/B][br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2008, 01:39:05 am[/size][hr]Please Post.

[size=30pt]~ The Kingdom ~[/SIZE]

Programmers[size=10pt][/size]

  • Jonny J - Main Server Coder (Creator Of JSRevolution)
  • Deadhead (Aka Wildy) - Server / Forums Coder. (Java, MySQL, And Php Expert)

This Server Was Born From The Popular Community Of Wildyscape, And Is Now Taking Shape As A Legendary Server Soon To Be Released, With Full IPB Intergration, The Server Has Fully Functional Highscores, Stat Signitures, And Account Management.

[size=20pt]RELEASE DATE : NOT SET[/SIZE]
